entry.source: {F812}Azazel\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,351601}I merely give those who seek freedom{F801}the chance to do so.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351602}The children of man who attain this{F801}knowledge are set free, will set forth{F801}to become even greater than angels.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351603}I shall not give in. Not to a mere{F801}puppet of God like yourself.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Azazel\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,351601}I merely give those who seek freedom{F801}the chance to do so.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351602}The children of man who attain this{F801}knowledge are set free, will set forth{F801}to become even greater than angels.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351603}I shall not give in. Not to a mere{F801}puppet of God like yourself.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Azazel\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,351604}To think that I would be defeated by{F801}a tool of God... Such humiliation...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Azazel\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,351604}To think that I would be defeated by{F801}a tool of God... Such humiliation...{F801}
